response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment that could greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is a fair and advantageous proposition considering its worth to you and my commitment to facilitating this transaction. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can proceed together.", "product_price": 900000}
